reviews.review: Yaaasss!!!! Loved it! Lot of action with a good amount of comedy!!
Not all it’s hyped up to be. Was wayy too long.

As someone who suffers from superhero fatigue, Infinity War was enjoyable, didn't drag on too often, and had far better dialogue than the last two Avengers movies. Still formulaic and has some huge plot holes, but it convinced me to watch the next one.
Twists and turns the best one yet

At this time of writing, I have seen AIW 6 times (1 IMAX 2D, 1 IMAX 3D, 1 real 3D and 3 standard). Yes, I fucking loved this movie that much. This is basically everything a Marvel comic book fan could hope for in a crossover movie this size. Fuck...the fact that this movie exists should be an achievement in itself! How the fuck does anyone produce a movie with 20+ characters from different branches of its universe and have all their stories somehow tie together? The Russo brothers are fucking geniuses. They need to be awarded some kinda achievement award for this 'cause the Oscars sure as hell wouldn't give this best picture or screenplay. This movie had me go through all kinds of different emotions - it's a fucking roller coaster ride if you're hugely invested in the MCU characters.

That said, this isn't a flawless movie though. There were times the CGI was pretty obvious and with this many characters, a few get the short stick in this - although I am confident they'll get to shine in A4.

If you haven't seen this movie, wtf are you doing??? This is history in the making, go see it!
grandes efectos especiales ,a pesar de tener una extensa duración su forma de estar armada es muy entretenida y buena.
It's a surprised and amazing movie. I recommend it.

Absolute emotional rollercoaster that hits the ground hard with the opening scene and title sequence. Pretty much sets the tone for the whole movie. Mainly a Thanos / Thor centered movie but all the characters get a good balance of screen time. Can’t wait for the next one!
does not stand alone as it own movie.
